title: Tesla
description: Designs and manufactures electric vehicles and clean energy solutions.

children.value: Tesla is revolutionizing the automotive industry with high-performance electric vehicles and sustainable energy solutions. From their sleek Model S to the innovative solar roof tiles, Tesla is driving towards a cleaner future.
Want to work at Tesla? Check out their careers page:
